La_Mesa.Alvarado Hospital:
Alvarado Hospital Medical Center is a 306-bed acute care hospital located in San Diego, CA, adjacent to San Diego State University. It is one of only two hospitals serving East County, San Diego. 


== Overview ==
Alvarado Hospital opened its doors in 1972 and currently offers more than 15 specialties, including a 24/7 emergency department that is designated a San Diego County STEMI (severe heart attack) receiving center.
